title: Israel Gutierrez
description: Katie chats with Israel Gutierrez about who he is and how that impacts his work. Topics include what it’s like to come out publicly; the problem with how we cover women’s sports; the value of authenticity; and, reluctantly, skin care.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie chats with Israel Gutierrez
